BT.modules.UC.mainContent

Class UCClassDiagramConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.modules.UC.mainContent.UCClassDiagramConnector

  • public class UCClassDiagramConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for connecting use case to class diagram. This class will reactivate class in class diagram based on selected object off useCase diagram.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
